Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''''EOF''''
Initial commit

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(npx tsx -e "import { packs } from ''./src/data/gameData''; console.log\(''Total packs:'', Object.keys\(packs\).length\); const allBlooks = Object.values\(packs\).flat\(\).map\(b => b[0]\); console.log\(''Total blooks:'', allBlooks.length\); const unique = new Set\(allBlooks\); console.log\(''Unique blooks:'', unique.size\); if \(allBlooks.length !== unique.size\) { const seen = new Map\(\); allBlooks.forEach\(b => seen.set\(b, \(seen.get\(b\)||0\)+1\)\); [...seen.entries\(\)].filter\(\([,c]\) => c > 1\).forEach\(\([name, count]\) => console.log\(''  DUPLICATE:'', name, ''x''+count\)\); }")
